name: Tokyo 30 days
description:
Your landlord is knocking at the door, and you still have one day left to live. How close are you to them! Will it trigger unexpected results. Landlord and Landlord's cats, I'm here!

Game features:

Branch storyline with multiple endings
Card game gameplay
Unique "Bullet Screen Game" Pussy Cat
Exquisite Art
Original soundtrack
Highly reproducible
Original plot and world
Huge character lineup
